contextId.information: The ordinal number "fourteenth" can be translated as "fourteen" or "14." AT: "After 14 days since the storm started, that night" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
contextId.quote: When the fourteenth night had come

contextId.information: The ordinal number "fourteenth" can be stated as "fourteen." AT: "For 14 days" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
contextId.quote: This day is the fourteenth day that
